attributes.action: MAKE HEART SCANS ROUTINE TO ALL BABIES AND CHILDREN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to see heart scans compulsary to ALL babies and children at birth and various points of childhood as there are far too many children dying of undetected heart defects in otherwise healthy children and young adults,if they are made routine it could save a life!
